entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Add `HttpHeaders.Add(string key, StringValues values)` #105606
  • The `ICorProfilerInfo::GetModuleMetaData` function returns `CORPROF_E_UNSUPPORTED_CALL_SEQUENCE`, while another approach with `IMetaDataDispenserEx` works #105603
  • [API Proposal]: Add `loggingBuilder.AddProviderFilter` helpers #105602
    Future
  • IConfigureOptions should always be registered as transient #105600
    Future

Closed

  • dotNET 9 AOT: Unexpected Behavior with StackTraceSupport and UnmanagedCallersOnly #105582
  • [mono] Vector shuffle failures in Mono LLVM scenario #105537
    9.0.0
  • Socket.Select() method doesn't work as expected on macOS #920
    9.0.0
  • JIT: Missing argument validation for `ExtractVector64` when optimizing #105479
    9.0.0
  • ILCompiler in .NET9 for FreeBSD does not produce usable binaries #105358
    Future
  • A potential out-of-bound read in `RuntimeInvokeHostAssemblyResolver` #104466
    10.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Setting minimum log level for console #105599
  • Convert.ToBase64CharArray throws IndexOutOfRangeException when encoding a zero-length slice of a non-empty source array into the zero-length slice at the end of a destination array #92016
    9.0.0
  • MissingMethodException thrown in native AoT application using AddStandardResilienceHandler() with .NET 9 preview.2 #105034
    9.0.0
  • [Perf] Triage backlog #92164
    9.0.0
  • 6.x.x or 7.x.x packages for a .NET 6 application? #92596
    9.0.0
  • Span.Fill(0) vs Span.Clear() #84126
    Future
  • JIT: inconsistent codegen CQ for divide by power of 2 idioms for array length #11441
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix SSPI ComputeIntegrityCheck with Sign level #105605
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • Suppress the special VSD callsite nop marker for NAOT x86 ABI #105604
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution

Merged

  • Don't create a constant node for Vector64 #105538
    area-Codegen-Intrinsics-mono
  • fix broken Select with error list on macOS #104915
    area-System.Net.Sockets, os-mac-os-x
  • JIT: Determine which ARM64 HWIntrinsics will throw ArgumentOufOfRangeExceptions #105527
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Export required symbols for FreeBSD ELFs #105587
    os-freebsd, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix a potential out-of-bound read in RuntimeInvokeHostAssemblyResolver #104536
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Fix invalid IndexOutOfRangeException in Convert #105339
    area-System.Runtime, 9.0.0
  • Fix ilc error message #105590
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Generate type generic composition information as constructed #105133
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Updated

  • JIT: Added SVE GetFfr, SetFfr, LoadVectorFirstFaulting, GatherVectorFirstFaulting #105595
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Randomized allocation sampling #104955
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [System.Diagnostics.DiagnosticSource] Support listening to meters out-of-proc using a wildcard #105581
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Improve codegen around unsigned comparisons #105593
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Use memfd_create when available #105178
    NO-MERGE, area-System.IO, blocked, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Avoid scanning isinst checks when building whole program view #104148
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2504237 #105050
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Implement `IUtf8SpanParsable` on `IPAddress` and `IPNetwork` #102144
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • SunOS process and thread support #105403
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, os-SunOS, community-contribution
  • Improve the performance of `BigInteger`.`{Max|Min}Magnitude`/`Abs` #105570
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Fix paltest_pal_sxs_test1 on illumos #105207
    area-PAL-coreclr, os-SunOS, community-contribution
  • Reset counters within Timer thread #105548
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, community-contribution
  • add hooks to debug OpenSSL memory #101626
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Fix MaxWorkingSet_GetNotStarted_ThrowsInvalidOperationException #105424
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, os-freebsd, os-mac-os-x, community-contribution
  • Issue 104700: Clarify error message for collection property with no getter #104861
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Delete simple quirks left from the `ASG` removal #86726
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Respect general-purpose bit flags when decoding ZipArchiveEntry names and comments #103271
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • Enhance the bound generator concept to remove duplicate parameters and make it more pervasive throughout the system #105597
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
